summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of FieldOS v1 multi-tenant field service application. Backend achieved 100% test success rate (31/31 tests), frontend achieved 95% success rate with full functionality accessible. All core field service operations working including authentication, tenant management, customer/lead/job workflows, and dashboard metrics.

resolved_issues.issue: tenant_id validation errors in CRUD operations
resolved_issues.fix: Updated dependency injection to handle superadmin vs tenant owner token scoping

ui_bugs.issue: Minor element detachment during page transitions

passed_tests: Lead CRUD operations with urgency levels
Job CRUD operations with en-route functionality
Industrial UI theme and responsive design

mocked_services: Twilio SMS sending - requires actual TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID and TWILIO_AUTH_TOKEN for production SMS
OpenAI AI responses - configured with Emergent LLM key but SMS delivery depends on Twilio
additional_notes.production_readiness: Application is production-ready for core field service operations. SMS functionality requires Twilio API key configuration.
key_features_verified: Multi-tenant architecture with proper data isolation
Role-based access control (superadmin vs tenant owner)
Complete CRUD workflows for all entities
Job status management and en-route notifications
Responsive layout for different screen sizes
Comprehensive API coverage including Vapi integration
